title: Los ricos también lloran
overview: It tells the story of Mariana, a humble and brave young woman who, after being left alone and helpless, comes by fate into the life of Don Alberto Salvatierra, played by Guillermo García Cantú, a business magnate and one of the wealthiest and most powerful men in the world. country. There, Mariana will meet Luis Alberto Salvatierra, one of the most sought-after bachelors, who experiences his own pain and who, seduced by Mariana's charisma, beauty and authenticity, will find true and most honest love. A romance alien to socioeconomic levels, social prejudice and cataloged as one of the most iconic of all time, but marked by tragedy, intrigue, jealousy, lies and even death.
